name: Suspicious Creation with Colorcpl
description: Once executed, colorcpl.exe will copy the arbitrary file to c:\windows\system32\spool\drivers\color\
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\colorcpl.exe AND (NOT (file.path:(*.icm OR *.gmmp OR *.cdmp OR *.camp))))`
